languages.text: "К сожалению, Ее Светлость Теодора не имела обыкновения делиться с нами деталями. Но вот встречалась она с Арбитес часто".

traits.locale_text: "К сожалению, Ее Светлость Теодора не имела обыкновения делиться с нами деталями. Но вот встречалась она с Арбитес часто".

languages.text: "Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, Ее Светлость Теодора не имела обыкновения делиться с нами деталями. Но вот встречалась она с Арбитес часто".

traits.locale_text: "Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."
"Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."
"Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."
"Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."
"Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."
"Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."

languages.text: «Por desgracia, lady Theodora no solía compartir esa clase de detalles con su tripulación, aunque puedo decirle que se reunía con el Arbites con frecuencia».
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, lady Theodora no solía compartir esa clase de detalles con su tripulación, aunque puedo decirle que se reunía con el Arbites con frecuencia».

languages.text: “很抱歉，舰长大人。尽管我知道西奥多拉夫人常与法务部的人见面，但她很少向他人透露相关细节。”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."

traits.locale_text: “很抱歉，舰长大人。尽管我知道西奥多拉夫人常与法务部的人见面，但她很少向他人透露相关细节。”

languages.text: « Malheureusement, votre prédécesseure n'avait pas pour habitude de partager ce genre d'informations avec son équipage, même si je sais qu'elle rencontrait régulièrement les représentants de l'Arbites. »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, votre prédécesseure n'avait pas pour habitude de partager ce genre d'informations avec son équipage, même si je sais qu'elle rencontrait régulièrement les représentants de l'Arbites. »

languages.text: 「残念ながら、私はレディ・シオドーラがアデプトゥス・アルビテスと頻繁に会っていたことを知っていますが、彼女は彼女のクルーとこのことについての詳細をめったに共有しませんでした」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、私はレディ・シオドーラがアデプトゥス・アルビテスと頻繁に会っていたことを知っていますが、彼女は彼女のクルーとこのことについての詳細をめったに共有しませんでした」

languages.text: "Maalesef Leydi Theodora, bu tür ayrıntıları mürettebatıyla pek nadiren paylaşırdı. Gelgelelim Arbites ile sıklıkla görüştüğünü biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."

traits.locale_text: "Maalesef Leydi Theodora, bu tür ayrıntıları mürettebatıyla pek nadiren paylaşırdı. Gelgelelim Arbites ile sıklıkla görüştüğünü biliyorum."

languages.text: "Bedauerlicherweise hat Lady Theodora derartige Details nur selten mit ihrer Crew geteilt, aber ich weiß, dass sie sich häufig mit dem Adeptus Arbites getroffen hat."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, Lady Theodora seldom shared any details of this sort with her crew, though I do know that she met with the Arbites frequently."

traits.locale_text: "Bedauerlicherweise hat Lady Theodora derartige Details nur selten mit ihrer Crew geteilt, aber ich weiß, dass sie sich häufig mit dem Adeptus Arbites getroffen hat."
